verbose_text: A blockade of phospholipase C (PLC) in HEK293 cells prevented KOR-agonist-induced PKCdelta translocation and GRPR phosphorylation, suggesting a role of PLC signaling in KOR mediated GRPR desensitization.
evidence: phospholipase C (PLC) in HEK293 cells prevented KOR-agonist-induced PKCdelta translocation and GRPR phosphorylation, suggesting a role of PLC signaling in KOR-mediated GRPR
